QuestData.Title: In Her Clutch
QuestData.Description: The crystal sings to the Klaxxi. They sense a paragon in the clutch, east of the tower.$B$BClutch-keepers are trying to pollute this one. The Klaxxi will not permit this.$B$BGo and find the paragon. Place your hands on his chamber, and the Klaxxi will channel their whispers through you to break him free. Protect him if you can.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We have found a paragon near your location.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate and waken the mantid paragon in The Clutches of Shek'zeer.
QuestData.RewardText: My slumber was interrupted by sudden dreams. Unspeakable nightmares.$B$BThen I awoke.$B$BThe Klaxxi have spoken to me. I have my orders. There is much to be done.
